Event.Task: The list of drives is populated and responsive to selection.
Event.Message: Finished populating the list of drives.
Started provisioning a portable workspace.
Finished provisioning a portable workspace.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProvisionCharacteristics" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceCharacteristics" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="WindowsImageCharacteristics" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="WindowsImageSizeInMb" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Selected device details: Friendly Name = %1, Name = %2, Drive Letters = %3, Size = %4, MediaType = %5.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FriendlyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriveLetters" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Size" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="MediaType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Selected image details: Path = %1, Architecture = %2, IsEnterprise = %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Architecture" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IsEnterprise" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Provision completed successfully.
Provision failed (HRESULT = %1).
The selected disk size is too small.
The selected disk does not report itself as a fixed media.
The WIM file was not found at: %1.
The selected WIM file is NOT supported.
The selected disk is too small to contain a 64 bit version of Windows.
Shutdown has been initiated while provisioning.
Validation of the WIM file failed (HRESULT: %1)
The Ready to Provision page is now active.
The Completed Page is now active.
The image search has completed
